Closes an opened connection

00088 
00089         if (NULL==conn) {
00090                 return LITM_CODE_ERROR_BAD_CONNECTION;
00091         }
00092 
00093         int code = pthread_mutex_trylock( &_connections_mutex );
00094         if (EBUSY==code) {
00095                 return LITM_CODE_BUSY;
00096         }
00097 
00098         //is it really a connection?
00099         int index = __litm_connection_get_index(conn);
00100 
00101         if (-1 == index) {
00102                 pthread_mutex_unlock( &_connections_mutex );
00103                 return LITM_CODE_ERROR_BAD_CONNECTION;
00104         }
00105 
00106         _connections[index] = NULL;
00107 
00108         // don't need to hold the mutex for the last part
00109         // of the operation: the connection isn't part of
00110         // the protected table anymore AND we stand less
00111         // chances for a livelock since we would be holding
00112         // another mutex when calling ``queue_destroy``
00113         pthread_mutex_unlock( &_connections_mutex );
00114 
00115         queue_destroy( conn->input_queue );
00116         free( conn );
00117 
00118 
00119         return LITM_CODE_OK;
00120 }//

Opens (creates) a new connection

00047         int target_index, code;
00048 
00049         code = pthread_mutex_trylock( &_connections_mutex );
00050         if (EBUSY==code) {
00051                 return LITM_CODE_BUSY;
00052         }
00053 
00054         target_index = __litm_connection_get_free_index();
00055         if (-1 == target_index) {
00056                 pthread_mutex_unlock( &_connections_mutex );
00057                 return LITM_CODE_ERROR_NO_MORE_CONNECTIONS;
00058         }
00059 
00060         *conn=malloc(sizeof(litm_connection));
00061         if (NULL==*conn) {
00062                 pthread_mutex_unlock( &_connections_mutex );
00063                 return LITM_CODE_ERROR_MALLOC;
00064         }
00065 
00066         queue *q = queue_create();
00067         if (NULL==q) {
00068                 free(*conn);
00069                 pthread_mutex_unlock( &_connections_mutex );
00070                 return LITM_CODE_ERROR_MALLOC;
00071         }
00072 
00073         DEBUG_LOG(LOG_INFO, "litm_connection_open: OPENED");
00074 
00075         _connections[target_index] = *conn;
00076         (*conn)->input_queue = q;
00077 
00078         pthread_mutex_unlock( &_connections_mutex );
00079 
00080         DEBUG_LOG(LOG_INFO, "litm_connection_open: END");
